Class ContentConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filter.clients.ContentConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContentConsumer

    public class ContentConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContentConsumer
    This class manages the Content consumer filter process

      • start

        public static void start(java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> contentArray)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Simple method to call filter messages for the collected interests
        Parameters:
        topics - topics that consumer is subscribed to
        contentArray - interests of the consumer as content
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - should be handled and make sure it is thread safe

      • start

        public static void start(java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> interest)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called for consumer interests that come in three categories as OR, NOT, AND. This method evaluates the messages for all three categories in NOT, OR, AND order of precedence
        Parameters:
        topics - topics that consumer is subscribed to
        interest - interests of consumer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - should be handled and make sure it is thread safe

      • start

        public static void start(java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
         java.lang.String expression)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This Method is to call filter messages for the collected interests as a NOA expression NOA expression contains &, | , ! and strings according to the string expression grammar
        Parameters:
        topics - topics that consumer is subscribed to
        expression - interests of consumer are taken as a NOA expression
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - should be handled and make sure it is thread safe
